argument.name: Image_Name/name> Character. The name of a built-in Alpha Anywhere bitmap, a bitmap that you have added to the current database (on the Code tab of the Control Panel ), one that you have loaded with UI_BITMAP_CREATE() , or the name of an image file on disk.

page.description: The {Image} command displays a bitmap (.BMP), cursor (.CUR), or icon (.ico) image. This command is to be used with transparent images.
